abstract: Gerardo Torrado Diez de Bonilla (born 30 April 1979) is a Mexican international footballer who plays as a midfielder for Cruz Azul and is captain of the team. He is known as "El borrego" ("The Sheep") for his bushy-like hair. His style of playing is commonly known to be a rough player in the field but a good recovery for the ball and effective passing.
